ScoreCounter.title: Score calculator for truck loaders
ScoreCounter.startat-dsc: Sets the hour and minute at which your score began counting down.
ScoreCounter.addpall-dsc: Adds the next pallets You've loaded to update the score calculation.
ScoreCounter.pause-dsc: Adds the amount of minutes spent on a break (max. 15 minutes).
ScoreCounter.turnoff-dsc: Turns off the calculations and saves the actual progress. Restarting after a shutdown takes into account the previously saved result (weighted average).
ScoreCounter.finishcalc-dsc: Ends the day at work. Resets settings to zero.
